entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of rain showers this morning. Snow level rising to 1100 metres near noon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1200 metres lowering to 900 metres before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Snow level 900 metres lowering to valley bottom in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023
